content: made with our new summer yarn wagami beige 100% paper in combination with gima 8 5 salvia 100% cotton it is the perfect oversized summer top the materials are comfortable to wear and keep you cool in the summer heat one size to fit most but easy to tweak it as you like it if you like it a little bit smoother you can use kinu 100% silk instead of gima 8 5 **version a** in row seamed size one size xs-l final bust measurement 112 cm / 44 height 52 cm / 20 ½ material 4 x ito wagami 100% paper 25 g / 273 yds here #522 beige 5 x ito gima 8 5 100% cotton 25 g / 212 m here #015 salvia worked with one strand ito wagami and one strand ito gima 8 5 held decrease needles 3 5 mm / us 4 circular ndl 24 gauge 25 sts and 32 row = 10 cm / 4 over st st in row using ndl 3 5 mm / us 4 errata * sts for co were incorrect there has to be a multiple of 4 + 2 sts correct are 142 sts that leads to 40 sts instead of 39 sts for the shoulder * 50 cm / 19 ¾ = 160 row from co ------------------------------------------------------ * m-zahl war falsch m-zahl muss teilbar durch 4 + 2 sein korrekt sind 142 m somit sind es auch 40 und nicht 39 m an der schulder * 50 cm = 160 r ab anschl **version b** in rnds seamless size one size xs-l final bust measurement 111 cm / 43 ¾ height 53 cm / 20 ¾ material 4 x ito wagami 100% paper 25 g / 273 yds here #527 black 2-3 x ito kinu 100% silk 50 g / 464 yds here #387 charcoal worked with one strand ito wagami and one strand ito kinu held decrease needles 3 5 mm / us 4 circular ndl 24 gauge 22 sts and 30 row = 10 cm / 4 over st st in rnds using 3 5 mm / us 4 ndl
